xxl.core.indexStructures

Class RevisedRTree.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node
      • xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node
        • xxl.core.indexStructures.RTree.Node
          • xxl.core.indexStructures.RevisedRTree.Node
  • Enclosing class:
    RevisedRTree

    public class RevisedRTree.Node
extends RTree.Node
    Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of RTree. Nodes are stored in containers.
    See Also:
    Tree.Node, ORTree.Node, RTree.Node

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  RevisedRTree.Node.Distribution
      Distribution is the class used to represent the distribution of entries of a node of the RTree into two partitions used for a split.

      • split

        protected Tree.Node.SplitInfo split(Stack path)
        Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
        Splits the current node. A new node is created, but no handle is reserved for this node in its container (i.e. container.insert() or container.reserve() are not called at this stage). This means that no index entry for this node is passed to its parent-node.
        Overrides:
        split in class RTree.Node
        Parameters:
        path - the nodes already visited during this insert
        Returns:
        a SplitInfo containig all information needed about the split

        Parameters:

        deltas - array of deltas
        dim - split axis
        Returns:
